Package org.fosstrak.ale.util

Class Summary
DeserializerUtil This class provides some methods to deserialize ec specifications and reports.
ECReportSetEnum backwards compatibility to provide ECReportSetEnum values.
ECTerminationCondition for backwards compatibility to provide the ECTerminationConditions.
ECTimeUnit For backwards compatibility this class provides a "shortcut" to the ALE ECTimeUnit.
EnveloperUtil This class provides some methods to packaging a message into a soap envelope.
HexUtil This method provides some methods to convert byte arrays into hexadecimal strings and vice versa.
ImplementationExceptionSeverity For backwards compatibility this class provides a "shortcut" to the ALE ImplementationExceptionSeverity.
SerializerUtil This class provides some methods to serialize ec specifications and reports.
StreamUtil This class provides a method to convert an input stream into a string.
